snippet: The Devils have a new captain, left wing Zach Parise, as they open their season on Saturday against the Philadelphia Flyers in Newark.
lead_paragraph: The Devils have a new captain, left wing Zach Parise, as they open their season on Saturday against the Philadelphia Flyers in Newark.

headline.main: Devils Look to Parise for Leadership, and Some Goals
headline.print_headline: Devils Look to Parise for Leadership, and Some Goals
headline.seo: Devils Looking to Zach Parise for Leadership, and Some Goals
